titles.title: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to conduct a collective response to a terrorism exercise that includes the management of cascading effects on critical infrastructure during times of extreme cold weather, and for other purposes.
Weatherizing Infrastructure in the North and Terrorism Emergency Readiness Act of 2019
Weatherizing Infrastructure in the North and Terrorism Emergency Readiness Act of 2019
Weatherizing Infrastructure in the North and Terrorism Emergency Readiness Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
